page.title: 09Queensbury Butcher
page.content: Mr Tomkinson has lived in Queensbury for all his life with his family. Most of Mr Tomkinson's family have lived in Queensbury for generations. The Queensbury life differs from Bradford life as the weather is winterie at winter as there are more hills about. In summer its very hot as they are very high up. Some people move there as the scenery is good as you can see for miles and miles.Mainly old people move to Queensbury is alot quieter than Allerton or Thornton people are alot friendlier as you could be walking down a street in Queensbury and someone would say "hello" but in Allerton they'd just walk past. Queensbury is a pretty busy place during the afternoon when school children come out of school.
